name: You're Being Audited.
description:
YOU'RE BEING AUDITED

They're at your door! You don't have much time to destroy all this evidence. Throw everything into the shredder. If the shredder jams just keep smashing it until it starts working again.

This game was made in 3 hours for Trijam #147: Just destroying stuff.

Let us know how many years you got in the comments.

CREDITS

A game by Emmy and Thomas.
All visuals and sound effects were created/recorded within the 3 hour jam time. The documents are derived from business templates.
